There is no movement inside the Stasis field, including speech.
  ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
  From: airly2000@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
  Sent: Wednesday, June 06, 2001 1:17 PM
  Subject: RE: HAHAHAHAHAHAHA=
HAHA


  OOC:

  Can the prisioner speak or that tramp doesn't let them do =
that?



  ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, June 06, 2001 10:46 AM
    Subject=
: Re: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA


    Ignatius stood up and stared at his statuesq=
ue prisoners. "Trainer circuitry" he commented "I'll bet you wish you had s=
ome." Like the overconfident captor he gloated walking up, glareing eye to =
eye with Drillbit. It was a bad mistake as the Predacons eyebeams fired. 

=
    "AHHHHH!!!" He yelled as the bots eye beams took a chunk out of his lef=
t cheek. He recovered enraged, he held his talons to the sides of Drillbits=
 head. "How about if I return the favor?"

    Hallucinagens mindtricks cam=
e into play. In Ignatius' mind he fired a missle at Drillbits head and miss=
ed, striking the coolant line to the main computer. without coolant the bas=
e would explode. "Look what you made me do!!" he shouted continuously not k=
nowing that the others couldn't see a thing.


      ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
      From: Alloran2@... 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   =
   Sent: Tuesday, June 05, 2001 12:08 PM
      Subject: Re: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAH=
AHA


      :::The Destrocons::: 

      ::They would have screamed if they=
 had the movement capacity to do so, but 
      since they didn't all three=
 of their brains were drowned in a state of fear 
      and confusion.  But=
 soon anger started setting in.  All of them were thinking 
      that if t=
hey ever got out of this, the Trainers would die slow and painful 
      de=
aths::
